name: Mountain Climbers
description:
Grab a controller and grab a friend, Mountain Climbers is a 2D platformer where you must make your way to the top of the mountain. Two players must work together, using one controller, to launch and fling their way to the top (also playable with one player).

**Currently a prototype showing off the concept, very basic layout with minimal level implemented. Level design and game systems have not been implemented.

Let me know your thoughts, if you encounter any issues or have any questions, also let me know. I'm happy to here any feedback on the idea.
